title: Foxworth Friday: Donda Sports Shuts Down, Aaron Rodgers is Fed Up, and NBA Dysfunction
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss Donda Sports, the NFL, the hilarity of an angry Klay Thompson, and more!
